dcterms:creator: F. Bernard
N. Vlassis
P. Gemmar
A. Husch
J. Thunberg
J. Goncalves
F. Hertel
dcterms:description: A dataset comprising 8 brain structure meshes of 17 subjects, with a total of 1792 vertices that are in correspondence among all subjects. The dataset is used to model the deformation of brain structures.
dcterms:title: Brain Structures

dcterms:creator: Y. Yang
Y. Yu
Y. Zhou
S. Du
J. Davis
R. Yang
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1531 female human body shapes, each comprising 12500 vertices that are in correspondence among the training set. The dataset is utilized for semantic parametric reshaping of human body models.
dcterms:title: Human Body Shapes
